Statement classes

Contains classes for language-independent representation of statements.

Summary
Statement classes
Contains classes for language-independent representation of statements.
Statement
Base class for all statement nodes.
Functions
getPHP
Returns the statement represented in PHP.
getJS
Returns the expression represented in JavaScript.
GenericStatement
A generic statement container.
Functions
__construct

Representation of an assignment.

Representation of an if-statement.
Functions

Changes the statement used for the else part.

Representation of a list of statements.

__construct
addStatement
Adds a statement to the group.

Statement

Base class for all statement nodes.

Summary
Functions
getPHP
Returns the statement represented in PHP.
getJS
Returns the expression represented in JavaScript.

Functions

getPHP

abstract public function getPHP($indent)

Returns the statement represented in PHP.

Parameters

$indentThe current indentation string that should be concatenated after newlines.

Returns

A string representing the statement in PHP.

getJS

abstract public function getJS( $indent,
DescParser $parser)

Returns the expression represented in JavaScript.

Parameters

$indentThe current indentation string that should be concatenated after newlines.
$parserAn instance of DescParser.  Generally needed because Expression::getJS needs this parameter.

Returns

A string representing the statement in JavaScript.

GenericStatement

A generic statement container.  This node can be used for statements that are fairly specific and it’s therefore not really convenient to write a new statement class for them.

Summary
Functions
__construct

Functions

__construct

public function __construct($php,
$js)

Parameters

$phpA string representing the statement in PHP.
$jsA string representing the statement in JavaScript.

AssignStatement

Representation of an assignment.

Summary
Functions
__construct

Functions

__construct

public function __construct(Expression $left,
Expression $right)

Parameters

$leftThe expression to assign to.
$rightThe expression to assign to the left expression.

IfStatement

Representation of an if-statement.

Summary
Functions
__construct
setElse
Changes the statement used for the else part.

Functions

__construct

public function __construct(Expression $guard,  
Statement $then,  
 $else =  null)

Parameters

$guardThe expression to check for truth
$thenThe statement to execute when $guard evaluates to true.
$elseThe statement to execute when $guard evaluates to false.

setElse

public function setElse(Statement $else)

Changes the statement used for the else part.

Parameters

$elseThe new statement to execute when the guard evaluates to false.

GroupStatement

Representation of a list of statements.

Summary
Functions
__construct
addStatement
Adds a statement to the group.

Functions

__construct

public function __construct(array $stmts)

Parameters

$stmtsAn array of Statements that form the group.

addStatement

public function addStatement(Statement $stmt)

Adds a statement to the group.

Parameters

$stmtThe statement to add.
